title: AP Malphite feels very strong rn
body: So let me say, this isnt him being op, but rn, his laning phase where he normally gets bullied, his q is doing alot of damage when combined with scorch and comet (Q usually does 20-25% max hp level 1), Would it be possible that he might sneak into the meta?

replies.body:
Every AP Malphite I see, whether on my team or the other, usually ends up feeding. Usually because he's less of a rock and more like mud.

If AP Malp is strong, I certainly haven't seen it yet.

> [{quoted}](name=Baron Barian,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=26ugXvwb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-02-21T03:29:02.973+0000)
>
> Every AP Malphite I see, whether on my team or the other, usually ends up feeding. Usually because he's less of a rock and more like mud.
> 
> If AP Malp is strong, I certainly haven't seen it yet.

Ive been doing pretty consistent with him, while he can lose, what i noticed tho, is alot of ap malph are running aery instead of comet?
